description: Not only does this app offer a gorgeous app with great user experience, but it has functionality that the Mac and web apps do not even have. For example, it has an integrated web server so you can remotely control the player from the web interface. It also shows lyrics and shows podcasts in one place (unlike the web app). The only downside is I can't seem to find a way to download for offline listening (that may not even be possible). In all I would recommend this app.
summary: This app is genuinely better than the Apple Music apps on Mac and web

description: best apple music player there is
It works. what else can i say?
Thank you! Best Apple music for Ubuntu
The only down side is that this works so well that I will continue delaying switching to spotify which I should've done years ago
summary: Love this! Finally something more than just a webapp wrapper

description:
This is an awesome work!
However please install the snap package from their site; otherwise the one provided on Snap Store (as of now is 1.4.6) is not as polished as the latest released.
summary: Best solution for Apple One/Music subscribers on Linux

description: Well I must say that I'm surprised. I was expecting some half baked app with great idea but bad realization. This proves me wrong. If you want Apple Music app for you Linux distro then you should consider Cider
summary: If you need Apple Music on Linux

description: I have been an Apple Music user for a long time now and I have been tumbling from web Apple Music to trying iTunes on Wine[failure] to whatnot. This software on Ubuntu 22.04 has been the most complete and most stable so far. Thank you so much!
summary: Amazing Software for Apple Music Users

description: I love this but it seems 1) o want to login everytime 2) wont play any of my music and 3) its very slow, however i do like it but it needs fixing
Sonst ein gutes Programm für zb eigene Playlists
summary: Für dieses Programm wird ein Appl-ID verlangt

description: Ich nutze sie täglich, und war mit dem streaming über Browser bei Apple schon länger nicht zufrieden. Das Programm ist genial und viel schöner, als das was Apple so bietet. Endlich Apple Music streamen auf meinem Linux-Rechner. Danke an die Entwickler, die echt viel Hirn, Verstand und sehr viel Herz in dieses Programm gelegt haben.
Gracias por hacer una exclente app para Apple Music
启动有点慢，但是界面很美观，在linux播放apple music音乐最好的选择
summary: 很好用的apple music第三方客户端
